Title: Authorizes and directs certain cities to conduct a study on the preparedness and readiness of such city to react and respond to certain disasters
Summary: Authorizes and directs certain cities to conduct a study on the preparedness and readiness of such city to react and respond to certain disasters.
ActClause: AN ACT in relation to authorizing and directing certain cities in this state to conduct a study on the preparedness and readiness of such city to react and respond to certain disasters
